001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Messages;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.PacketArrayList;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.models.PumpResponseMessage;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.L;
009
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.Hex;
011import org.apache.commons.lang3.NotImplementedException;
012import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
013
014import java.util.Arrays;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.UUID;
017
018public class BTResponseParser {
019    private static final String TAG = "BTResponseParser";
020
021    public static PumpResponseMessage parse(TronMessageWrapper wrapper, byte[] output, MessageType outputType, UUID uuid) {
022        PacketArrayList packetArrayList = wrapper.buildPacketArrayList(outputType);
023        return parse(wrapper.message(), packetArrayList, output, uuid);
024    }
025
026    public static PumpResponseMessage parse(Message message, PacketArrayList packetArrayList, byte[] output, UUID uuid) {
027        L.d(TAG, "Parsing event with: message: "+message+" \npacketArrayList: "+packetArrayList+" \noutput: "+Hex.encodeHexString(output)+" \nuuid: "+uuid.toString());
028        checkCharacteristicUuid(uuid, output);
029
030        packetArrayList.validatePacket(output);
031        if (!packetArrayList.needsMorePacket()) {
032            byte[] authKeyVal = new byte[0];
033            if (message.signed()) {
034                authKeyVal = PumpStateSupplier.authenticationKey.get();
035            } else {
036                try {
037                    authKeyVal = PumpStateSupplier.authenticationKey.get();
038                } catch (IllegalStateException ignore) {
039                    authKeyVal = new byte[0];
040                }
041            }
042            if (packetArrayList.validate(authKeyVal)) {
043                byte[] a = packetArrayList.messageData();
044                byte[] copyOfRange = Arrays.copyOfRange(a, 3, a.length);
045                byte b4 = packetArrayList.opCode();
046                L.d(TAG, "Parsing message with opcode "+b4);
047                Message msg = Messages.parse(copyOfRange, b4, Characteristic.of(uuid));
048                if (msg == null) {
049                    L.i(TAG, "PARSED-MESSAGE-FAILURE(" + CharacteristicUUID.which(uuid) + ", " + b4 + ", " + message.signed() + "): " + Hex.encodeHexString(copyOfRange));
050                } else {
051                    L.i(TAG, "PARSED-MESSAGE(" + CharacteristicUUID.which(uuid) + "): " + msg);
052                }
053
054                return new PumpResponseMessage(output, msg);
055            } else {
056                L.d(TAG, "PacketArrayList could not validate");
057            }
058        } else {
059            L.i(TAG, "PacketArrayList needs more packets: "+Hex.encodeHexString(output));
060            return new PumpResponseMessage(output);
061        }
062
063        return new PumpResponseMessage(output);
064    }
065
066    public static PumpResponseMessage parseBestEffortForLogging(byte[] output, UUID uuid) {
067        if (output.length < 3) {
068            L.e(TAG, "parseBestEffortForLogging input has less than 3 bytes");
069            return null;
070        }
071        byte txId = parseTxId(output);
072        byte opCode = parseOpcode(output);
073        MessageType messageType = MessageType.fromOpcodeBestEffort(opCode);
074
075        Message message = null;
076        try {
077            message = Messages.fromOpcode(opCode, Characteristic.of(uuid)).newInstance();
078            message.fillWithEmptyCargo();
079        } catch (NullPointerException|InstantiationException|IllegalAccessException e) {
080            L.e(TAG, "parseBestEffortForLogging", e);
081            return null;
082        }
083
084        try {
085            TronMessageWrapper tron = new TronMessageWrapper(message, (byte) txId);
086            PacketArrayList packetArrayList = tron.buildPacketArrayList(messageType);
087            return BTResponseParser.parse(tron.message(), packetArrayList, output, uuid);
088        } catch (Exception e) {
089            L.e(TAG, "parseBestEffortForLogging", e);
090            return null;
091        }
092    }
093
094    public static Byte parseTxId(byte[] output) {
095        Validate.isTrue(output.length >= 3, "BT-returned data should contain at least 3 bytes: '%s'", Hex.encodeHexString(output));
096        /*
097        output[0] = packet index mod 15
098        output[1] = transaction ID
099        output[2] = opcode
100         */
101        return output[1];
102    }
103
104    public static Byte parseOpcode(byte[] output) {
105        Validate.isTrue(output.length >= 3, "BT-returned data should contain at least 3 bytes: '%s'", Hex.encodeHexString(output));
106        /*
107        output[0] = packet index mod 15
108        output[1] = transaction ID
109        output[2] = opcode
110         */
111        return output[2];
112    }
113
114    private static void checkCharacteristicUuid(UUID uuid, byte[] output) {
115        // if (Intrinsics.areEqual(uuid, TAllowedCharacteristics.authorizationCharacteristics()) || Intrinsics.areEqual(uuid, TAllowedCharacteristics.currentStatusCharacteristics()) || Intrinsics.areEqual(uuid, TAllowedCharacteristics.controlCharacteristics())) {
116        List<UUID> rawBleNotifyUuids = Arrays.asList(
117                CharacteristicUUID.AUTHORIZATION_CHARACTERISTICS,
118                CharacteristicUUID.CURRENT_STATUS_CHARACTERISTICS,
119                CharacteristicUUID.CONTROL_CHARACTERISTICS);
120
121        if (rawBleNotifyUuids.contains(uuid)) {
122            // normal
123        } else if (CharacteristicUUID.QUALIFYING_EVENTS_CHARACTERISTICS.equals(uuid)) {
124            // Qualifying event of:
125            // bluetoothGattCharacteristic.getIntValue(20, 0).intValue()
126            throw new NotImplementedException("Qualifying event characteristic: " + Hex.encodeHexString(output));
127        } else if (CharacteristicUUID.HISTORY_LOG_CHARACTERISTICS.equals(uuid)) {
128            // stream write
129            //throw new NotImplementedException("History log characteristic: " + Hex.encodeHexString(output));
130        } else if (CharacteristicUUID.SERVICE_CHANGED_CHARACTERISTICS.equals(uuid)) {
131            // onServiceCharacteristicsChanged
132            throw new NotImplementedException("Service changed characteristic: " + Hex.encodeHexString(output));
133        } else if (CharacteristicUUID.CONTROL_STREAM_CHARACTERISTICS.equals(uuid)) {
134            // Control stream (opcodes: -27, -25, -23)
135            //throw new NotImplementedException("Control stream characteristic: " + Hex.encodeHexString(output));
136        } else {
137            throw new NotImplementedException("Unsupported UUID: " + uuid + " output: " + Hex.encodeHexString(output));
138        }
139    }
140}
